pr_title: Add tuple type descriptor support to new parser

Added test cases for the tuple type desc.
Changed the type of memberTypeDescriptors to Node.

timeline.bodyText: Here types.get(i) will give you a RestDescriptorNode.I think you'l have to get the typeDescriptor field of it, to pass to createTypeNode() method.
timeline.author: SupunS
SupunS

timeline.bodyText:
Without removing and adding, can we do this check and create the RestDescriptorNode, before add it to the list.
May be introduce a new method like parseTupleMember() and do it inside that method. Then here instead of calling parseTypeDescriptorInternalwe can call that method. WDYT?
